skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: micro brew radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Streaming straight from the Brewhouse in the town centre, our shows are created and hosted by volunteers from the town and surrounding areas. We are your go to place for shows made by your neighbours, including - topical talk radio segments that communicate events and features surrounding us, communities of fandoms from book lovers, film buffs and gaming enthusiasts, and of course fresh music from local bands and artists. 

Tune in now to plug in directly to your community, or get in touch and be part of the station yourself!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
